result.reason: The 'Connect with options' dialog allows modifying connection properties but does not expose the 'Connect without credentials' functionality available in the context menu. Adding this option to the dialog would allow users to combine ad-hoc property changes with the no-credentials flag.
result.approach: Modify FrmConnectWithOptions to include a 'Connect without credentials' checkbox. Update the form to expose this state. Update ConnectionContextMenu.OnConnectWithOptionsDialogClicked to check this state and pass ConnectionInfo.Force.NoCredentials to ConnectionInitiator.OpenConnection.
